titles.title: To remove the authority of the Ninth Circuit Court of Appeals to sit en banc with fewer than all circuit judges in regular active service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 3/2/2005--Introduced. Removes the authority of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit to perform its en banc functions with fewer than all circuit judges in regular active service pursuant to court rules.
